page.title: 06Cramlington:A Typical Family
page.content: The "Browns" are similar to many families in the town. Mr.Brown is a fitter in a factory in Blyth, where he goes each day in his 3 year old car. His wife works as a packer in a factory on the nearby industrial estate, but only in the evenings.The two Brown children go to the local First School, a short walk from the semi-detached house they live in. Mr.Brown owns this, and is thinking of making it bigger in case the family grows. He enjoys working in his garden, and playing squash at Concordia, the local sports centre. His wife goes there,too, to swim and to play badminton. His son and daughter play out on their bikes a lot, and have a computer to share. Each year they go on holiday to Spain, by bus to an apartment. Klondyke F.S.
